headline: Don’t Call Them Comebacks. Ulta Beauty, Gucci, and 3 Other Retail Turnarounds to Watch.
summary: From Ebenezer Scrooge to Darth Vader, some of the best stories are tales of redemption.  While TD Cowen analyst Oliver Chen is cautiously optimistic about sales in the holiday season—he says back-to-school shopping has been “relatively solid”—he argues that the valuations of retail winners of past years reflect that favorable outlook.  Investors should look instead at turnaround stories that could be potentially on the rise, he said in an overview of the sector published Wednesday.

Investors should look instead at turnaround stories that could be potentially on the rise, he said in an overview of the sector published Wednesday.

headline: Ulta Beauty Announces 2025 MUSE Accelerator Cohort
summary: BOLINGBROOK, Ill., September 03, 2025--Ulta Beauty, the nation’s largest beauty retailer, today announced the eight brand founders that will participate in the 2025 MUSE Accelerator program. Starting September 8, these early-stage brands spanning cosmetics, skincare, haircare and wellness, will kick-off an enriching 10-week journey that includes a robust curriculum, mentorship and funding to fuel growth and prepare for retail distribution.
